titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious proclamation to the cittyes of London and Westminster by the King.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Bibliography of royal proclamations of the Tudor and Stuart sovereigns and of others published under authority, 1485-1714, 1967.
